body_html:
Thanks @marcgreenstock ! So many goodies in this PR, I can't even 😄

Two minor things:

  1. Can you add your .env as .env-example to the repo? I will take that one as base for #124 then
  2. About action_mailer.raise_delivery_errors = false: it's odd that we get errors. I'll check it out locally myself to see what kind of errors we get. The tests should never send real mail, but maybe there are some expectations failing due to mails being shoved into the background queue.

body:
Thanks @marcgreenstock ! So many goodies in this PR, I can't even :smile: 

Two minor things: 
1. Can you add your `.env` as `.env-example` to the repo? I will take that one as base for #124 then
2. About `action_mailer.raise_delivery_errors = false`: it's odd that we get errors. I'll check it out locally myself to see what kind of errors we get. The tests should never send real mail, but maybe there are some expectations failing due to mails being shoved into the background queue.
